section.title: Introduction
section.para: The purpose of this documentation is to describe how to use the virtual appliance which embeds Ulteo Open Virtual Desktop components such as Session Manager, WebClient Java/HTML5, FileServer,

section.title: Run it !
section.para: Quite easy to use, the OVD Virtual appliance allows you to quickly get an idea of what is OVD and how this works. Check you shell console to get the IP
Once run, you should have access on an OVD demo farm. Go to http://iporfqdn
